title: Suspicious Looking Skull
summaries: The Suspicious Looking Skull is used to summon Ocram, a boss exclusive to the [img:Old-gen console version] Old-gen console version and Nintendo 3DS[img:Nintendo 3DS version] version. Like most bosses, two Ocrams cannot be summoned at the same time, and attempting to summon a second will not work. Ocram can only be summoned in a Hardmode world at night.
The Suspicious Looking Skull requires, in total, 20 Souls of Light, 6 Lenses, 15 Iron/Lead Bars, 30 Bones, 8 Souls of Night, and 10 Adamantite/Titanium Bars.
